tip.text: Look out for the go naked kids
My fav spot at NYC ;)
Great people watching. Spotty wifi. Whatever you do, don't get on the L train.
Sit here. There are benches.
Phone Battery Dead? Check out the Solar Battery Docking Station for your mobile phone on Union Square West btwn 14th & 15th Streets!
While sitting on the benches, if there are any scraps of food near your feet kick them away immediately or prepare for totally unafraid birds and animals to basically corner you, lol.
People watch, make new friends, listen to cool music, enjoy the chaos.
the market is a must, be prepared to give a free hug.
Beware of those conspiracy theory people. GO to the organic market, buy any round, hard fruit and hit one of them in the head with it. That always works
One of the best things about NYC.
the city's premier people watching spot
Go buy some organic stuff from local farmers if the green market is in town
Listen to live band playing...
Meet at the Ghandi Statue, the one landmark in NYC, where the West side and the East side converge . . . and where D met his own Eastern-philosophy spouting pseudo-soul mate (Only in Your Dreams)
I love this park. There is always something going on, great energy and vibes from the people.
Be a street vendor, without vending anything or physical exchange of money (for this u need tax id). E.g. Spray perfume /cologne on ppl as a "case study" sephora would you like to sponsor this??
Go to Union Square Playground - coolest new 15,000 square playground in downtown NY - Union Square Park at 16th Street. Take 4,5,6,N, R, Q, W Train to 14th Street exit onto 16th Street
There's always something going on - looking to hang out and enjoy some free entertainment - spend some time at union square. Pillow fight 2010 - a definite success!
Swarm! !!
newmindspace nyc pillowfight saturday april 3rd @3pm!
Union Square is home to four historical monuments: Mohandas Gandhi, the Marquis de Lafayette, Abraham Lincoln and George Washington. Can you find all of them?
Check out www.amazingstrangers.com and find the crazies
Take advantage of the Sunny day
Get a couple fresh apple cider donuts. Eat them.
Free wifi!
If you check too many times here, you end up with a badge saying you conquer playgrounds. This I didn't want.
Get SPOTTED by the Purina Team with ur dog for a chance to WIN!!!
Go to the annual pillow fight here! bring a pillow and hit some people.
Perrrrfect day...2 katch thoze Sun RaYz
Watch skaters. Participate in a silent rave. Free Wi-FI. Get bonked on the head by rabid urban squirrels. Feel like a city girl at the farmer's market. Sleep on the dirt during a blackout.
LIVE Union Square Webcam - bit.ly/UnSqCam
Minuteman Statue
my place
Go on a Wed or Sat to get into a fight with the women in black.
Just people watch. It's hilarious.
Come recycle your unwanted textiles at the NW corner of the greenmarket...no more tshirts in landfills!
Sitting at B&N, reading a book, and viewing the Square is a good moment.
Go to Union Square on Saturday afternoon. Checkout the farmers market and street vendors.
Wait for the b-boys
Always busy, always awesome! Check out the Farmer's Market for some awesome fresh, local food! Always something art related going on too! Sit, relax, watch the street performers.

special.message: 6/14 – 7/12: Get a free 16 oz. black tea lemonade for every 10th check-in. Redeem from 5 p.m. – 9 p.m. at our coffee bar.

Sitting at B&N, reading a book, and viewing the Square is a good moment.
Go to Union Square on Saturday afternoon. Checkout the farmers market and street vendors.
Wait for the b-boys
Always busy, always awesome! Check out the Farmer's Market for some awesome fresh, local food! Always something art related going on too! Sit, relax, watch the street performers.

special.message: 6/14 – 7/12: Get a free 16 oz. black tea lemonade for every 10th check-in. Redeem from 5 p.m. – 9 p.m. at our coffee bar.

tip.text: Look out for the go naked kids
My fav spot at NYC ;)
Great people watching. Spotty wifi. Whatever you do, don't get on the L train.
Sit here. There are benches.
Phone Battery Dead? Check out the Solar Battery Docking Station for your mobile phone on Union Square West btwn 14th & 15th Streets!
While sitting on the benches, if there are any scraps of food near your feet kick them away immediately or prepare for totally unafraid birds and animals to basically corner you, lol.
People watch, make new friends, listen to cool music, enjoy the chaos.
the market is a must, be prepared to give a free hug.
Beware of those conspiracy theory people. GO to the organic market, buy any round, hard fruit and hit one of them in the head with it. That always works
One of the best things about NYC.
the city's premier people watching spot
Go buy some organic stuff from local farmers if the green market is in town
Listen to live band playing...
Meet at the Ghandi Statue, the one landmark in NYC, where the West side and the East side converge . . . and where D met his own Eastern-philosophy spouting pseudo-soul mate (Only in Your Dreams)
I love this park. There is always something going on, great energy and vibes from the people.
Be a street vendor, without vending anything or physical exchange of money (for this u need tax id). E.g. Spray perfume /cologne on ppl as a "case study" sephora would you like to sponsor this??
Go to Union Square Playground - coolest new 15,000 square playground in downtown NY - Union Square Park at 16th Street. Take 4,5,6,N, R, Q, W Train to 14th Street exit onto 16th Street
There's always something going on - looking to hang out and enjoy some free entertainment - spend some time at union square. Pillow fight 2010 - a definite success!
Swarm! !!
newmindspace nyc pillowfight saturday april 3rd @3pm!
Union Square is home to four historical monuments: Mohandas Gandhi, the Marquis de Lafayette, Abraham Lincoln and George Washington. Can you find all of them?
Check out www.amazingstrangers.com and find the crazies
Take advantage of the Sunny day
Get a couple fresh apple cider donuts. Eat them.
Free wifi!
If you check too many times here, you end up with a badge saying you conquer playgrounds. This I didn't want.
Get SPOTTED by the Purina Team with ur dog for a chance to WIN!!!
Go to the annual pillow fight here! bring a pillow and hit some people.
Perrrrfect day...2 katch thoze Sun RaYz
Watch skaters. Participate in a silent rave. Free Wi-FI. Get bonked on the head by rabid urban squirrels. Feel like a city girl at the farmer's market. Sleep on the dirt during a blackout.
LIVE Union Square Webcam - bit.ly/UnSqCam
Minuteman Statue
my place
Go on a Wed or Sat to get into a fight with the women in black.
Just people watch. It's hilarious.

Go to Union Square on Saturday afternoon. Checkout the farmers market and street vendors.
